**BeepingTermometer By Skavin (30/4/15)**

* * *

BeepingTermometer is a part the beeps at a specific percent of maxTemp

the threshold is configurable via the slider on the part.

it also shows the max percentage of maxTemp in an optional button (toggle display of window bindable to an action group)

Part Category

Utility

![3VtvTQd.png](https://i.imgur.com/3VtvTQd.png)

![5anx7qw.png](https://i.imgur.com/5anx7qw.png)

https://sourceforge.net/projects/beepthermometer/

I would like to thank Nifty255 and cybutek for their helpful youtube videos and code as this is my first C# project.

Dependencies

none

Download from

[https://sourceforge.net/projects/beepthermometer/](https://sourceforge.net/projects/beepthermometer/)

How to install

find where your game is installed

extract contents of zip int the folder named GameData

so you should have <ksp install="" path="">/GameData/BeepingTermometer</ksp>

How to Uninstall

delete the folder BeepingThermometer
